definition: great talent/rare capability/person of outstanding ability
ability/talent/sb of a certain type/a capable individual/only/only then/just now

sentences.english: These measurements could reach an altitude of 30 kilometres before the balloon burst.
sentences.chinese: 探空气球可升至30公里高才爆裂。

sentences.english: I: Did you choose this company on account of high pay(or remuneration)?
sentences.chinese: 你是因为薪水高才选择本公司的吗？

sentences.english: Once out of the red Chiba, Ho Chi Cao on account of high times.
sentences.chinese: 一朝开出红千叶，何啻高才十倍曹。

sentences.english: Did you choose this company on account of high pay？
sentences.chinese: 你是因为薪水高才选择本公司的吗？

definition: lit. not dare to pull oneself up high (humble term)/I cannot presume on your attention
brother (polite appellation for a friend one's age)
an outstanding talent (idiom)/surpassing insight and acumen
worthy or virtuous person/honorific used for a person of the same or a younger generation
